text:
Nginap disini karena ada acara kantor. 
Untuk ballroom nya besar dan cocok untuk event meeting dg perlengkapan yang memadai (sound, lighting, viewer, backdrop, meja kursi). Saat acara kemarin sound nya oke, bening, nggak ada bikin telinga berdengung. Lighting nya juga bagus, cukup terang untuk nampilin paparan.
Menu makanan, bisa memilih sendiri set menu yg diinginkan. Aneka minuman nya enak, urap, sup sari laut rekomended. Masukan untuk menu yang pakai lontong, lontongnya kalau lebih lembut teksturnya pasti mantab. Kemudian menu bubur ayam di breakfast, buburnya sedikit hambar jadi kalau ingin menikmati harus lengkap dg kuah, sambal dan kecap2an agar berasa. Pernah juga menu fish fillet baiknya kurangi garamnya sedikit.
Snack jajanan yg dicoba enak tu mini martabak, tahu bakso, tahu berontak. Size nya besar dan rasanya gurih sedep.
Selain egg corner, ada indomi di pagi hari, kalau lagi gak selera makan, indomi pilihan yg cocok, hahahha.
Satu hal penting yang jadi nilai plus disini untuk meeting, yaitu internet nya kenceng poll. Cukup sekali login device bisa tersambung meski pindah2 ruang: kamar-ballroom-lantai 1,2,3 langsung nyambung. Cocok sih disini untuk meeting.
Pelayanan front office, room service, crew hotelnya sopan dan ramah. Thank you ~
title: Business, meeting need

text:
Saya menginap 3 malam di excecutive suite. Hotelnya bagus, makanannya enak-enak. Saya suka dessertnya. Petugas ramah, baik, sangat membantu. Ada masalah dengan kunci kamar sebanyak 2 kali (tidak bisa digunakan), namun petugas fast respons untuk membantu.
Lokasi sangat strategis, bersebelahan dengan aloon-aloon semarang. Ke kota lama cukup dekat, jalan kaki. Banyak kaki lima. Dekat dengan lumpia mbak liem, toko oen (jalan kaki).

title: Butuh renovasi

text:
Saya menginap semalam di hotel ini karena melihat banyak review yang positif, padahal sebelumnya hotel ini tidak pernah saya lirik karena letaknya yang berada di sebelah pasar dan terkesan kuno.

Saya booking via re*er*asi.com, dan mendapat harga 211.600 include breakfast. Dan ketika saya tiba di hotel, turun dari taksi, tidak ada petugas yg menyambut, apalagi membawakan koper dan barang. Pintu masuk lobi pun tidak ada yg membukakan. Dalam hati saya berpikir, sepertinya salah pilih hotel..

Lalu di resepsionis baru ada sambutan, dan saya lgsg check in, mendapat kamar di lantai 3 dg view pasar johar. Proses lumayan cepat, dan diharuskan deposit 200rb.

Lalu kami menuju kamar dg menggunakan lift yg hanya ada 1 saja, pelan dan sempit. Ternyata di tiap lantai ada petugas jaga, mantab. 

Sesampainya di kamar, kesan hotel tua sudah terasa. Namun kelengkapannya lumayan. Kamar luas, kursi sofa, berkarpet dan tersedia kulkas dan mesin pembuat kopi. Di kamar mandinya terdapat bathtube dengan amenities yg terbilang cukup lengkap, sabun, shampo, sikat gigi dan cottonbud. 
Bahkan sandal hotel pun yg tebal alasnya, bukan yg tipis.

Pada beberapa dinding kamar sangat perlu perawatan krn sudah mengelupas temboknya, shg menimbulkan kesan kumuh dan jorok. Bathtube nya juga pecah, ada tambalannya, yg cukup berbahaya bila tergesek kulit.

Breakfast nya rasanya enak, apalagi dengan harga yg cuma 211 rb, ini terasa luar biasa. Menu bervariasi, ada nasi putih dan nasi goreng, salad, bubur ayam, soto madura, bubur sum2, roti panggang, egg corner, dan mesin pembuat kopi. Saya cicipin semua, rasanya mantap. Khusus soto madura, citarasanya mantab banget... terasa dagingnya.

Check out terbilang cepat, dan kembali saya tidak menemukan bellboy ataupun petugas yg membukakan pintu.

Overall, ini bukan hotel terbaik, namun dg harga cuma 200 an rb, hotel ini terasa sangat sangat istimewa. Saya akan kembali lagi jika ke semarang
title: Bukan hotel terbaik, namun apa yang didapat melebihi ekspektasi

Makanan disini enak, layanan juga ramah. Kami sering memakai meeting room di hotel ini karena ruangan meeting terhitung banyak dan bisa mengakomodir kebutuhan kami. Hanya satu yg kurang dari hotel ini, untuk kelas bintang 4 hotel ini tidak mempunyai swimmingpool.

locations.name: Metro Park View Hotel Kota Lama Semarang
Metro Park View Hotel Kota Lama Semarang

text:
Hari ini saya mencoba untuk menginap di Semarang setelah dari Surabaya. Disini saya coba untuk memilih New Metro Hotel karena tertarik dengan letak nya yang strategis. Ada beberapa kelebihan dan kekurangan dari hotel ini, sebagai berikut.

Kelebihan:
- Letak Hotel sangat Strategis dekat dengan Kota Tua, Lokasi Kuliner, Paragon Mall serta Stasiun Tawang
- Nuansa Hotel yang Klasik Tua sangat bagus bagi yang mau menginap disini
- Pelayanan dari Staff & Security yang baik dan ramah
- Kamar Executive yang sangat luas, rapi dan bersih
- AC yang cukup dingin, tetapi menimbulkan sedikit suara berisik
- Di kamar mandi terdapat bathtub dan shower. Jarang hotel dengan harga yang lumayan terjangkau di lengkapi dengan dua fasilitas ini
- Variasi makanan sarapan yang cukup banyak dan lumayan enak

Kekurangan:
- Terdapar pipa air didalam lemari. Disebelah lemari gantungan baju. Mungkin disetiap kamar ada ini
- Kursi dalam kamar hotel kurang terawat sudah goyang
- Sinyal Wi-Fi sangat buruk malah tidak bisa masuk ke kamar. Bagi yang mau akses Wi-Fi cepat bisa ke lobby atau menginap di kamar lantai 2
- Tempat Kloset yang terlalu mepet dengan Wastafel, atau Wastafel nya mungkin yang terlalu besar
- Hotel dekat dengan Pasar Johor. Saat siang sedikit berisik dan rame
- Lift cuma ada satu dan sedikit lambat. Jika rame harus menunggu dulu hingga kosong/sepi
- Banyak cat di kamar dan lorong yang sudah kusam. Mungkin kurang diperbarui

Secara keseluruhan, Hotel yang sekarang bernama New Metro Hotel tidaklah buruk, tetapi juga tidak terlalu bagus, 50:50. Banyak hal yang harus diperbaiki atau ditata ulang di beberapa bagian Hotel. 

Bagi kalian ingin menginap dengan nuansa Hotel Klasik Tua dengan Harga Terjangkau silahkan lah menginap disini. Lokasi nya juga sangat strategis. Not Bad lah
title: Hotel Tua Klasik dengan Harga Terjangkau

text: Pada awalnya saya kurang yakin akan kemewahan hotel ini, secara lokasinya bersebelahan dengan pasar. Dalam hati saya, nggak apalah, toh saya menginap di sini hanya butuh tempat menginap untuk urusan kerja saya di Semarang. Tapi begitu masuk lobby kemudian ke kamar, saya merasakan hotel yang mewah. Saya sampai berkali-kali keluar kamar untuk melihat -lihat sekeliling dalam hotel. Kemudian saat breakfast, saya sampai bingung memilih makanan, karena pilihannya banyak, akhirnya saya cicipin hampir semua makanan yang ada. hehehe.. tentu saja sayam mbil porsi sedikit-sedikit. Dan yang masih terkesan di saya adalah pelayanannya. Ada beberapa baju saya yang ketinggalan, kemudian saya telepon ke hotel, saya sampaikan ada baju saya yang ketinggalan , mereka menawarkan untuk mengirimkan baju saya ke rumah saya di Malang- Jawa Timur. beberapa hari kemudian baju sudah sampai di rumah saya tanpa kekurangan satu apapun. terima Kasih Hotel New Metro Semarang. Suatu saat, jika ke Semarang saya akan menginap di sini lagi.

text: Hari pertama tiba di semarang, aku menginap di sini. Kamar mandi dilengkapi bathtub dan hair dryer. Sarapannya enak dan variatif, suamiku paling seneng sama soto sulung nya. Hari terakhir trip di jawa tengah waktu ke semarang aku nginep lg di sini, kali ini bener2 dapat kamar executive double bed, ya lumayanlah tp agak sempit trus lampunya jg temaram, gak begitu menyenangkan sih tp lumayanlah. Lokasi deket pasar johar. Oh iya gak ada pelayan yg bantuin angkat barang, gak ada petugas yg berjaga di pintu lobby. Furniturenya sdh banyak yg tua. Lemari di kamar, banyak debunya. Plafon di kamar executive lantai 5 yg pas samping lift itu udah jelek bgt

Walaupun termasuknya hotel tua namun hotel ini terawat dengan baik. Kondisi kamar yang luas, nyaman dan bersih. Hotel ini juga sepertinya sudah dilakukan renovasi. text: Harga yg dibayar termasuk murah jika dibanding apa yang kita dapat. Kamarnya nyaman, Kamar yang saya pesan cukup luas, ada 2 jenis kasur di dalamnya, double bed dan single bed. TVnya sudah pakai LED dengan 29 chanel. Menu sarapannya juga lengkap dan enak. Ada beberapa makanan yang sudah siap saji, soto betawi, bubur ayam, roti, buah2an, minuman, dan olahan telur yang akan dimasak chef sesuai pesanan tamu. Pelayanannya juga cukup baik, ketika saya menitipkan barang saat check-out, staf di sana memberi kartu untuk bukti pengambilan barang, bahkan setelah akan diambil, stafnya menawarkan supaya dibawakan. FYI, tambahkan anggaran 200rb untuk deposit, ketika check-out akan dikembalikan.
title: Nice place to stay

text: sangat kecewa dengan pelayanan hotel ini. saya dan 2 tamu lain ( total book utk 5 kamar) mendapatkan perlakuan yang sangat tidak nyaman ketika akan chek in pada 23 juli 2015, kamar yang kami telah book melalui online, dinyatakan sedang dlm keadaan rusak jadi tidak bisa ditempati. Pemberitahuan tsb di sampaikan ketika kami hendak check in. Bukan jauh hari sebelumnya. Padahal sore itu saya sudah telpon ke hotel memberitahukan kalau akan late check in.  saya yakin ini pasti karena kamar yang telah kami book telah diberikan kepada tamu yg go show. dan tuduhan ini kami sampaikan terang2an kepada petugas yg ada di meja reception dan mereka tidak membantah sama sekali. setelah lebih dari 2 jam menuntut hak kami melalui perundingan yang alot, akhir nya pihak hotel memindahkan kami ke hotel lain yang Alhamdulillah  jauh lebih bagus. itu pun setelah website tempat kami book online menelpon pihak hotel sebagai tindakan follow up atas pengaduan kami.
title: Bookingan kami dicancel sepihak oleh pihak hotel

text: Walaupun hotel ini sudah tua, namun kondisinya masih sangat bagus. Berada di pusat kota sehingga mudah kemana saja. Fasilitasnya pun bagus, pelayanan memuaskan, kamarnya pun luas. Didaerah chinatown dan dekat dengan pasar Johar.
title: Hotel Nyaman di pusat kota

text:
Hotel New Metro Semarang yang berlokasi di hoek dekat area China town dekat dengan pasar.

Design kamar yang mewah pada jamannya (era tahun 90an) berlantai marmer dan karpet, ruangannya luas cocok bagi yang membawa keluarga. Fasilitas yang cukup memadai dari TV LED 32", kettle pemasak air panas, safe deposit, Kasur yang nyaman, AC dingin, hair dryer, bathtub,  

Breakfast terdapat banyak varian makanan dan cukup lezat rasanya. Pelayanan ramah.

Parkir kendaraan yang luas, ketika akan checkin, diharapkan membayar biaya parkir Rp.5.000,- berlaku selama tinggal disana. Ketika checkout serahkan tiket parkir ke  receptionist untuk mendapatkan tiket free parkir - yang untuk ditukarkan kepada petugas parkir di tempat kita membayar pertama, dan Rp.5.000,- pun dikembalikan.
title: Hotel Nyaman di Pusat Kota Semarang

text: Lokasinya bersebelahan dengan pasar tradisional, tapi dekat dengan shoping mall besar, hotel ini sudah lama tapi kondisinya masih bagus, kamar luas, dan makan paginya juga lumayan enak, pelayanan ramah dan cepat, harga lumayan murah.
title: Hotel tua tapi kondisinya bagus

text: Hotel ini adalah hotel bintang 4. Hotel New Metro, satu grup dengan Hotel Sunlake Hotelnya hotel lama, tapi ruangannya cukup luas, bersih, cukup terawat. Kamar mandi jg bersih walaupun bukan hotel baru. Di kamar mandi ada bath tub, cm sayang ga ada bath soap(sabun untuk bath tub).Harganya juga terjangkau untuk sekelas hotel berbintang dan dapet breakfast jg. Cuma untuk koneksi wifinya rada lambat dan susah konek. Semoga bisa diperbaiki. Parkirnya jg luas dan tempatnya strategis, dari jauh gampang terlihat. Pokoknya recommended bgt deh menginap disini untuk yang lagi mau jalan2 ke semarang.
title: Classic but comfortable

text:
Menginap 2 malam di hotel ini, untuk transit menuju jakarta dari pacitan. 
(+) Security ramah saat menerima kami dipintu gerbang
(+) Proses Check in cepat, walaupun kami check ini jam 22:00
(+) Petugas di lobby sigap membantu kami menurunkan barang-barang.
(+) Kamar sangat luas (ruangan eksekutif), bersih dan AC central. Kamar mandi bersih
(-) TV masih tabung, channel TV lumayan banyak. namun kualitas gambar kurang bagus (kabur)
(+) Ruangan klasik, memakai karpet seperti ruangan era awal 200an. 
(-) Kami dilantai 5 sedikit berisik dengan suara exhaust fan/Sistem AC di ujung koridor.
(-) Dibeberapa bagian di koridor kamar hotel terdapat bercak bocor. Hotel ini butuh perbaikan/renovasi. 
(+) Sarapan Pagi cukup enak, dengan variasi menu yang banyak. Petugas sigap mengisi makanan yang telah habis. Anak kecil <5 thn gratis, tp 5-12 tahun membayar Rp. 30rb
(+) Tempat parkir sangat luas, jangan takut kehabisan tempat parkir
(-) Agak sulit mencari tempat makanan di sekitar hotel, harus menggunakan kendaraan untuk mencari tempat makan. Namun hotel menjual roti di lobby sebagai camilan dihotel. 
(+) Staff sangat ramah dan bernuansa Islam, karyawati semuanya menggunakan jilbab. 

Kesimpulan = Hotel ini cukup menyenangkan, namun sebaiknya dilakukan perbaikan atau renovasi ke suasanan yang lebih modern.
title: Hotel Bagus perlu Renovasi

title: Metro hotel semarang

text:
Terletak di pusat kota semarang dekat pasar johar. Hotel ini cukup nyaman dan bersih. Staf hotel cukup ramah terhadap tamu. Tapi sangat disayangkan, makanan yang disediakan rasanya sangat kurang. Sebagai orang indonesia pencinta sambal, selama 4 malam disana, yang disediakan hanya sambal botolan. Menunya pun kurang variatif dan kurang nendang. 

Hotel ini terdiri dari 5 lantai. Namun lift yang disediakan hanya ada satu. Jadi kalau saat lagi banyak yang butuh, harap bersabar.

Hotel yang sdh cukup lama, tetapi sdh direnovasi, bersih, AC dingin dan fasilitas baik
title: Hotel Di pusat kota lama

text: Kami memilih Hotel New Metro karena ingin mendapat akses yang gampang ke pusat kota dan area Pecinan. Kebetulan ada promo online yang bagus. Lokasi memang sentral (dekat stasiun KA Tawang dan Kota Tua), dan persis sebelah Pasar Johar. Hotel ini terkenal oldies yang baru saja mengalami renovasi sana sini. Beberapa area seperti Lobby terkesan beraura 1970an dan kadang sirkulasi nya tidak maksimal. Tapi lantai 2 tempat kamar kami ada lumayan cerah. Kamar standar, bisa lebih baik. Detil kurang diperhatikan, seperti ceret listrik yang sudah karatan. Layanan lumayan, dengan ruang sarapan yang lumayan lega dan cerah. Dengan harga promo, kami tidak bisa mengeluh, tapi semoga renovasi yang dijalankan memang baru tahap awal, alias masih tetap berlangsung. Wifi hanya di lobby.
title: 'Oldies', lokasi sentral

text: Hotel ini menyediakan layanan yang variatif, staff yang ramah, pilihan makanan yang beragam, serta kenyamanan dan ketenangan dalam beristirahat. walau berada di dekat simpang lima, hotel ini memberikan ketenangan dan kenyamanan dalam menginap. sangat memuaskan.
title: Hotel Unik dengan Harga Fantastik

text:
Saya memesan hotel ini melalui booking.com, harga yang ditawarkan sangat fantastis, bayangkan dengan harga hotel melati mendapatkan pelayanan kualitas bintang 3 plus. Sudah termasuk sarapan pagi dan gratis layanan pijat untuk 15 menit. Nggak nyangka dapet harga segitu. Menu sarapan yang variatif dan enak.
Hanya saja keadaan hotel yang terkesan suram, gelap dan kualitas air yang sedikit berbau yang sedikit mengurangi kenyamanan di hotel ini. Sebagian besar saya dan rekan-rekan nyaman tinggal di hotel ini.
title: Hotel Klasik harga fantastis

text: kami sampai di semarang hampir tengah malam lokasi hotel di tengah kota lebih tepatnya didekar pasar johar, jadi kalo waktu mepet dan acara padet tetep bisa belanja di oleh-oleh di pasar johar dan lagi pelayanan nya sangat memuaskan ramah
title: deket johar

text: hotel ini terletak dekat dengan kawasan kota tua semarang dan bersebelahan langsung dengan pasar johar, pasar terbesar yang ada di kota semarang. hotelnya cukup bagus, ratenya 300rban, kamarnya cukup luas, fasilitasnya juga oke, sarapan lumayan. Overall cukup worthed menginap dihotel ini.
title: Hotel murah & nyaman

text: dilihat dari bangunan hotel ini tergolong bangunan lama, namun interior design nya sangat klasik,, saya sangat suka, sangat mengagumkan,, untuk fasilitas layaknya hotel mewah lengkap dan semua berjalan dengan baik (kulkas dingin, wifi lancar, fasilitas bathroom juga lengkap ada hairdryer)., sarapan pagi juga sangat variatif, yang saya kurang suka adalah lokasi hotelnya yang berada disamping pasar dan kebeneran letak view jendela kamar yang langsung menghadap pasar, jadi tidak enak dipandang.. namun overall hotel ini sangat baik sebanding dengan harganya, saya menginap di kamar ekseutif dengan rate 700.000/mlm
title: hotel lama yang klasik namun mengagumkan..

text:
Karena adik kecil saya ikut, kami memerlukan untuk memesan 1 ranjang tambahan untuknya. Waktu menunjukkan pukul 2 dini hari ketika kami tiba untuk check in. Kami sangat kelelahan dari perjalanan panjang dan tiba-tiba resepsionis berkata bahwa menurut aturan hotel, ranjang tambahan tidak dapat dipesan untuk kamar eksekutif??!! Kami sangat terkejut! Karena kami tidak menerima pemberitahuan sebelumnya. Resepsionis menjelaskan bahwa kamarnya terlalu kecil untuk diberi ranjang tambahan maka mereka menganjurkan kami untuk meningkatkan kamar. Kami memaksa untuk berbicara kepada manajernya, dan setelah diskusi internal, akhirnya mereka bersedia untuk memberikan ranjang tambahan di kamar kami. Meski masalah ranjang tambahan sudah terselesaikan. Kami sudah terlanjur tidak puas dengan pelayanan mereka

Waktu sudah menunjukkan pukul 2 dini hari dan mereka seharusnya lebih pengertian terhadap kebutuhan pelanggan mereka
title: SANGAT BURUK!! Mungkin tak kan mengunjunginya lagi?!!

text: Menginap dengan keluarga selama 5 hari 4 malam, mereka memberi kami jemputan gratis dari bandara, antar-jemput ke kantor perjalanan JogloSemar, kamarnya besar, lengkap dengan sofa, TV nya OK, tapi lokasinya sangat dekat kemanapun.... Kami berjalan ke restoran tertua Toko Oen, Lumpia Mbak Lin, kami bahkan berjalan ke Pasar Malam di pemukiman China, orang tua saya sedikit kecewa karena kami tidak dapat kembali kesana karena saat musim libur, mereka penuh. Jika kami berwisata ke Semarang lagi, kami AKAN kembali ke hotel ini.
title: Lokasi yang bagus, pelayanan dan pantas dengan harganya!!!

text: Hotel yang cukup bagus...rate 300rban...kamar luas & lumayan..breakfastnya variatip...sayang lokasinya dideket pasar yg kumuh..so agak kurang nyaman kalo dibuat jalan kaki disekitar hotel ....

text: ini salah satu hotel terbaik yang pernah saya kunjungi....kamar yang luas...pelayanan yang baik....dengan harga yang sangat masuk akal....hotel ini dekat sekali dengan pusat2 bisnis di kota semarang....mudah sekali dijangkau dengan angkutan publik...benar2 hotel yang cocok untuk perjalanan bisnis....saya amat merekomendasikan...
title: istimewa...!!

text:
Let's give you the good news first. The room was large, clean, and comfortable.

However, I already had received an early warning that this hotel was poorly managed when the three messages that I sent prior to arrival (two were sent as messages via the Agoda system and the third was direct to the hotel's reservation@metrohotel.co.id email address) weren’t answered.

I found the hotel's room service to be disorganised. Calls to the '117' room service number seemed to be diverted to Reception and I'd then have to wait ages for the receptionist to connect me to room service. On the first evening that I tried using room service, I asked for a banana split but was told that they were out of stock. On another evening, I ordered a vegetable curry and a bottle of beer. The curry arrived cold and, presumably because the serving tray had been tilted, with much of the sauce slopped from the plate onto the tray. Also, the garnish of raisins mentioned in the room service menu was missing. But the amateurishness didn't end there. After the waiter left, I noticed that I couldn’t drink my beer because no bottle-opener had been provided. I called room service again and was amazed to learn that the waiter couldn’t lend me or use a bottle opener. Instead, he came back to the room, took the bottle away to open it, and then returned it to me. What a ridiculous palaver! On the last night, when I dialled ‘117’, a sleepy voice answered, said something in Bahasa, and hung up.

When I checked out, I asked to speak to the manager about the last night’s incident. I was told that there was no manager on duty (which I find hard to believe). So, I put my complaint in writing and requested a reply within three days. Now, four days later, no reply. So, at least the management is consistent with its unresponsiveness!

One other sign of poor management. The curtains to the room didn’t close fully. My guess is that this fault had been there, unattended to, for quite a long time. But, to be fair, it was promptly rectified after I reported it. However, the repair was a bodge, with it no longer being possible to open the left-hand curtain.

I hope to visit Semarang again. It was my first time there and I liked it. But I don’t intend staying again in this shambolic hotel.
title: Unresponsive management, erratic room service

text: search it by traveloka, search filter : under idr 300k include breakfast.. just for a place to stay during work assigment there, only for a night... booked Executive King, With Breakfast for les then idr 300k, at that time, i think it was a low season, because i have serached for another date, costed over idr 300k. checked in in the afternoon, after my job is done, surprisingly, i have been around there couple months before, just to have friday prayer in the nearby big mosque. greeted by two friendly and well groomed front office staff, politely asked me my reservation details and my id off course, also fill out some identity forms, and in return i received a key card, that when i used it first time didn't worked, so i have to asked to front office staff, and eventually they gave me 2 key cards, in case one of them didn't worked again. entering the tidy and spacious room with 1 double bed,1 single bed, 1 person sofa, round table with electric kettle, and tv with working refrigerator , the electricity didn't the card to be functioned. checked the hot water, it worked fine, so i filled up the bath tub.. the aminities also standard : two tooth brush, 2 soap bar, 1 for hand and 1 for body, 1 bottle shampoo and conditioner and a shower cap, a hairdryer also available... checked the cupboard, a mini safe also available. The AC worked very fine, i got chills at night, so i have to turned off the AC. Finally i got asleep very early. woke up, have a bath, and went downstairs to have bnreakfast. the menu was also OK, considering the budget. the only minus was the reception was not so good but they have many cable programm. the interior also looked old But overall for me, it was worth the money spent, even more. addition : called housekeeping to borrow a prayer mat, and took just a little time to have it in my hand. one thing kinda bothers me, a call from the spa offering a promo while i sleeping. don't know what time it was, but i guess it was not so late,cause i slept early, remember?oh yes, wifi also superb
title: Satisfied

text:
The Hotel is located only about 100 meters to the "Kota Lama", or commonly called the Little Netherland, the colonial heritage area that mostly have to visit site in Semarang. You will find several ancient buildings are still beautiful to see, such as the Gereja Blenduk, kolonial church built in 1930, and Semarang Tawang Station building, that built in 1911 by the colonial era.
Also It is an three star Hotel nearby with Semarang's 0 Km Monument. The hotel is equipped with a fitness center, sauna and spa, and it is quite spoil yourself during your holidays. It has a strategic location that side by side with the iconic market in Semarang, Pasar Johar.  The market was designed by renowned Dutch architect Thomas Karsten in 1937.
title: A comfort Hotel near the Zero Km of Semarang city

text: This hotel have a big room size with full facility as a four stars hotel with competitive price compare with some budget hotels. Old hotel but the room quality still the best. Reccomended to stay here when you in Semarang rather than staying in some budget hotel with similar price rate.
title: Great room and service

text:
This hotel is old building with old school ornaments and low corridor roof. The location is strategic. I could go to Kota Lama for about 10 minutes by walking, and to Lawang Sewu for about 10 minutes by pedicab.

I spent 3 nights in executive twin room and felt comfortable. The room was spacious enough. But the air conditioner sound was loud and electrical socket position to recharge my gadget was difficult, i couldn't find socket beside my bed. But with relative cheap price, overall this hotel was satisfying.
title: Pay less for more

locations.name: Metro Park View Hotel Kota Lama Semarang

text:
Been staying here many times since 2011-2016.. Good value of money.. Always have good experiences so far this hotel is always get my expectation. Spacious parking lot. Located in the city so easily access everywhere.. Peak season always fully booked.. Staff is helpful 
I would like to feedback about the towels - I think the towels need to be replace
title: Good Hotel.. Good service

text:
My wife and I stayed here last night for one night. 
We really like the Old Town of Semarang so the location is very good.
The main lobby seems to indicate a good quality hotel but our room was very poor. Tired and faded and a long way from being clean. 
The main light did not work so it was quite gloomy too.
I was also bitten by (I hope) mosquitos through the night, we had assumed that we would not need to put our mossie net up in this kind of place.
We would have given a lower score but this morning the breakfast was ok, and we were given a free shuttle car to the airport, hence the just scraping into a score of 3. 
There are much better hotels in Semarang.
title: Barely scraped in with a score of 3

text:
The room is kinda old, but its classic and pretty comfy. I love the breakfast. It's various and the taste is good!

But its too bad there's no swimming pool at the hotel. Fitness centre is available.

This hotel near Jl Pemuda Semarang and Train Station (Poncol and Tawang). You can visit Masjid Agung Kauman for pray (moslem).
title: Nostalgic and cozy

text: This hotel easy to find, the building so big, near old city, and at main road. So many delicious food near this hotel. I arrived so late almost midnight but the staff still greeting nice, quick check in. The room is clean&comfort, old models room, but there is mark on the bathroom. Breakfast tasty good.
title: Nice hotel and staff
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan ASUS 7 Stub App Tablet

text:
Since I never go to Semarang, I am totally blind about everything in Semarang. When I chose this hotel, I didn't know where it is and how it looks like so I just depend on the information I got from the internet.

It changes its name into New Metro Hotel Semarang since there are some renovation. The lobby is superb. There are some antique chairs that my mother likes. :)

When I saw the room, I got very surprised because I didn't expect much with the expense that I spent to book it. The room is big enough. There is a refrigerator, a sofa and an additional of AC (It has 2 ACs, though the other one is an old one). This is my first time of being able to sleep well without feeling cold from midnight to dawn. :)

The breakfast is good. There are some food you can choose. Chicken Soto, Chicken Rice (I like this very much), Rice and some side dishes, porridge, fruit and pudding. You can eat them all if you can. :D
title: Never have such a room like this

text: This hotel is very comfortable and suitable for me.  The services are excellent.  The receptionist is very helpful.  The access is not difficult.  The price is relative cheap but the facilities covered the best.
title: Love it

text: Metro Hotel. Hmmm... i love this hotel. Hotel Metro is pioneer hotel's in Semarang. They Have a big meeting room , comfortable ,clean and dity, good service  and staff is friendly. My guests who stay in Metro fell satisfied.  Never fell disappointed with this hotel. Low cost perfect service. Try it yourself..
title: I try meeting room

text:
At first, we didn't have high expectation for this hotel. We knew that's Metro is an old hotel, but the price was kind of affordable.
That's why we were so surprised when our room was upgraded to superior room. The room had 1 double bed, 1 single bed, 1 sofa, and the remained area was still spacious. The bathroom and its equipments were nice and clean. The furniture and decoration was quite old, but still acceptable.
The breakfast menus were delicious. We love it during our three day stay. Value for money, indeed.
title: Value for Money

locations.name: Metro Park View Hotel Kota Lama Semarang

text: This is my 2nd time stay in this hotel. If you compare with its rate, this hotel was the best. You can get 4 or 5 star room with 3 star rate. When I stay for the 2nd time, I get veerrryy very big room with 1 double bed and 1 single bed. And there's also sofa there. Excellent hotel !!

text: It quite old ambiance but has an excellent service, the room is old fashion but well maintained, breakfast has variety of food and the services are nice and fast respond..a nice place for parents and kids because the superior has a huge space....it got a nice spot near to every where but surrounded by one way road so it takes time to reach the hotel

text: When i came to the hotel, i feel like in an old building but very nice decorations, the staff is very nice, quiet room and strategic place near Pemuda street, but i think the hotel must do some upgrade for a breakfast, thats all, thks.

text: First time stayed here on July 30 and again August 29. No doubt old hotel. But it was cozy, spacious and comfortable. Rate is amazing and strategic. Sure it is an old hotel but it is well mantained.  Will I stay here again? Definitely.

text: Old hotel in Semarang. You'll be feel like living 10 years ago. The staff is very nice, warm welcome, fast check in and check out (i booked via agoda). Have bathup in the rooms. text: I am sure this property must be the best hotel if i came 10 years ago.. its not like others 3 star hotel in town, its might be the oldest one. The rooms are clearly stated old with many stain on the wallpaper but the bath room are really well maintain. The check in and check out runs smooth and relatively fast and well trained. They really generous to give newspaper with relatively cheap room rate prices. Considering others property on their chain it might be the least one, might be the owner already forget about their first property on their portfolio.
title: its old but..

text:
The hotel is old, the room has no sufficient air circulation, the AC is not working properly. The personnel is unskilled, have no experience with online booking that asked me to pay based on the hotel rate and not the one stated in the booking confirmation. That was really2 draining my energy, since we arrived quite late at the hotel and want to have rest. After talking to the manager then the problem solved.

Not only that, as a requirement, they asked us to give ID card, there is no problem with that, but they forgot to return it to us. We realized that 6 days after the check out date. They didn't even try to contact us as we gave all the email and phone number. While the ID card should be return in the check in stage, since they only need to copy the ID, not to keep it.

The personnel is very unskilled and really drain my energy and overall hotel is poor, except for the clean towell.
title: Unskilled personnel

text: Metro hotel is located next to Pasar Johar. There are tourist attractions near this hotel, such as: Tawang station, gereja Blenduk, nightmarket Semawis ( open weekend only) that can be reached on foot. This hotel also offered all-u-can-eat breakfast with healthy jamoo javanese beverage. The minus of this hotel was how they located the guest in some rooms that located on the way to ballroom. As my experience, I stayed there when there was a big meeting for NU association in the ballroom. it's really inconvenient to come in and out of the room since there were many people in the corridor to my room 3258.
title: Hotel near Johar market and Blenduk Church

Room is big but a bit old , bathroom need a refresh too. Very good breakfast both continental and javanese style. Ask for a no smoking floor in case of no smoker.  
Friendly staff and helpfull .

text:
Unexpected. First I looking this hotel at agoda. I feel this hotel not comfortable. and then I still buy this hotel because Rates Room cheap and I am not to much money hehe...

Annnnndddd.... I Looking real room.. WOW.. Very Very Value for money. Not New Room, buat facilities in the room very complete, and they have Rollaway bed. I looking the bathroom very comfortable, they have bathtube, hair dryer, telephone, etc. This room Like the hotel four or five star.

text:
Actually three times already i've been stay in this hotel, the first and the second they give me exactky the same room, which is not really cold for the air con, the third times i've been upgrade to deluxe room, its onle big room that really not necessary for me as a young couple.

The problem is always same,AC too hot. I really concern about the air con to make guest feel comfort in the room.

Within one month, every week when i go to semarang always choose this hotel but menu for the breakfast is always same. Please be concern about air conditioning and breakfast,Thanks.
title: Always same

text:
We booked this hotel in a very short notice on our recent trip to Semarang, and we saw bad review from other travelers, and a negative review from a local friend. But we decided to give it a try anyway. And we found that it's not bad at all.

The lobby is oldish 80s type, but the room is spacious, and they have a sofa bed that can accomodate 2 youngsters. And the place is so close to chinatown (within walking distance to gang Lombok, lumpia mbak Lien, toko Oen) and a short trip to Gereja Blenduk. Since chinatown street are not in grid system, and most of the are one way, exploring by foot would be preferable.

We decided to stay for 2 nights, and the hotel staffs even managed to arrange that breakfast for both days to be taken at the last day of stay, so the kids can enjoy the sumptuous breakfast as well. Breakfast selection are quite unique, it has jamu (indonesian traditional herb juice) served in beverages section. So you can try the local taste in an international setting and hygiene standard.

The only drawback is, since it's very close to traditional wet market, you will be waken up early in the morning by street noises and mosque speakers. ;)
title: Decent place to explore Semarang Chinatown

text:
Location especially in the evening is not good , so many stranger people around the hotel.
In the early morning and till late is little bit loud because direct opposite the market pasar johar.
Walking distance to supermarket sri ratu and many local small restaurant.
Room is big and bathroom is small & bad shower facility but value for money if you want just sleep.
title: Hotel in local market location

text: I stayed at this 3 stars hotel for 2 nights. Though now they add the word New before Metro Hotel, an old and gloomy impression is still visible in this hotel. Large and quiet room but not clean enough, spots appear on the walls and the roof because of leaked, but the bed is comfortable. Old bathroom and bathtub with strong shower, slow wifi internet (Telkom Speedy) with speeds below 100kbps, only has one slow elevator so we have to wait longer for up and down. Slow check in and check out, breakfast was average. Actually this hotel is good enough with good price, but they still need to be renovated, and refresh / improve their staff's skills and performances.
title: Gloomy hotel

text: Hi..I came here from KL on 2nd MArch 2012, with a family of 3.The hotel looked classic.Room is nice with internet free access (Telkomsel) hotspot 3rd floor. Facilities and Local dishes breakfast real delicious. Restaurants staffs so helpful and smile a lot. Staffs so polite and friendly with good service. I will for sure come back again next round.
title: Metro Hotel Semarang nice and pleasant stay

text: don't be fooled with the cover. and it is true with Metro Hotel Semarang. even though the hotel itself was not a superb class or in regional chain but surprisingly they maintained a very good services. room was large and it did not cost me more than $50 for a night. it is located somewhere a bit isolated but i don't think its that far to downtown consider Semarang is not a big city so you can just hail a cab or rent a car. one thing i like about this hotel is that their breakfast selection is still retaining Indonesian food. good for those who are in a budget.
title: a surprise

text:
I stayed in this hotel many times when I'm in Semarang. The rooms are huge, and the bed is a very comfy king size bed. And the best thing is the price, only around IDR 350,000. Bathroom is good, bathtub is clean and the shower is strong. There's one incidence when the tap is broken, they responded very quickly and replace the tap with the new one in less than 30 minutes. 

Breakfast is standard 3 star hotel breakfast, some toast, bread, fried rice, noodle and egg station. The hotel doesn't have a swimming pool.

Location is probably the drawback, because it is right beside the main market in Semarang (Pasar Johar). It's not a nice neighborhood and it's not advisable to walk alone at night. 

However, it's a short walk to the old town of Semarang where there are two great restaurants, and also a short walk to the famous Toko Oen restaurant on Jalan Pemuda. Taxi or becak is easy to get if you don't fancy walking or taking public transport.
title: Very good value for such a low price

text:
i stayed in a executive room, i payed only USD 30nett room only. got a 24sqm room. 
semarang is a small city, so dont worry regarding to hotels shopping malls and others
title: huge rooms for a very low price

text: Perfecte service. We werden goed geholpen nadat we in eerste instantie geen fijne kamer hadden. Zonder problemen konden we een andere kamer krijgen in het hotel. De massage op de kamer was ook zeker voor herhaling vatbaar. Fantastische roomservice. Volgende keer komen we weer terug.
title: Semarang first time

text:
Nos alojamos en este hotel unicamente porque teniamos que hacer noche para coger un vuelo desde semarang.
Desde fuera parece un hotelazo en un barrio pobrisimo pero entras al edificio y es antiguo y con decoracion antigua.
Aparentemente tenia todo tipo de codidades pero ni el aire funcionaba correctamente.
El personal del hotel nos intento cobrar el servicio traslado hasta el aeropuerto cuando venia incluido en el precio. En el comedor no hablan ingles.
No repetiria

text: Dit hotel heeft een groots entree maar de kamers zijn duidelijk van vergane glorie. Oud tapijt, lampjes werken niet, badkamer is muf. Maar de prijs is goed (17 euro per kamer) bedden zijn goed en de douche heeft een lekkere straal. Ook centraal gelegen.
title: Vergane glorie met goede prijs

text:
Vieil hôtel qui sent très fort la cigarette. Le wifi ne fonctionne quasiment pas, ni dans la chambre, ni dans les parties communes. Le restaurant est très cher pour le menu proposé. La salle de bain est vieillotte avec une baignoire qui ne fait pas envie. 
Les point positifs (il y en a quand même) sont la taille de la chambre qui est spacieuse et le petit déjeuné qui est bon et varié.
title: Décevant

text: L hotel a ete referencé par erreur par le gérant a jakarta alors qu il est a semarang. J ai reservé et payé ma réservation et ils ont refusé de rembourser. Heureusement, agoda a été très cool mais de la part de l hotel 7  C est inadmissible.  Guillaume
